types.html:
touski m (plural touskis)

  1. (Quebec, slang) everything, all there is; especially, all the toppings or fillings available with a dish, all-dressed
  2. (Quebec, slang) a dish made out of several different kinds of leftovers, made to use them up
    • 2021 (January 25), Savourer, "10 petits gestes écolos à adopter en cuisine," Radio-Canada:
      Apprenez aussi à substituer des ingrédients en cuisine, pour improviser aisément des « touskis », avec tout ce que vous avez!
      Also, learn to substitute ingredients when cooking, to easily improvise dishes made out of leftovers with everything you have on hand!

Coordinate terms

[edit]
  • all-dressed
  • de luxe
  • deluxe
  • luxe
  • toute garnie

See also

[edit]
English
  • all dressed

  • the works
trans: especially, all the toppings or fillings available with a dish, all-dressed
a dish made out of several different kinds of leftovers, made to use them up
